definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Adjustable hook-and-loop straps for optimum fit and feel.
sentences.chinese: 可调钩环带为最佳的契合和感觉。

sentences.english: Classic mary jane with adjustable hook-and-loop strap never goes out of style.
sentences.chinese: 可调钩环带的玛丽珍经典永不熄灭的风格。

sentences.english: The entire pattern from a Roman Legion Medal jewelry ring.
sentences.chinese: 整个图案由带有古罗马军团勋章的环带饰品。

sentences.english: Any of various minute aquatic animals of the phylum Gastrotricha, having a wormlike, ciliated body.
sentences.chinese: 任一种微小的腹毛类水栖动物，身体似虫状，环带纲。

sentences.english: Angled hook-and-loop strap for secure fit.
sentences.chinese: 安全合适的角度的钩环带。

sentences.english: A new technology of direct extraction by methanol was set up to prepare the crude polysaccharide from mycelia of Panaeolus cincutlus.
sentences.chinese: 建立了环带斑褶菇菌丝体粗多糖的甲醇一步提取法。

sentences.english: The study of plane pure-phase equi-width ring diffractive optical lenses is reported.
sentences.chinese: 报道二维纯位相环带衍射光学透镜的研究。

sentences.english: Dual off-set hook-and-loop straps promote a custom fit.
sentences.chinese: 双抵销钩环带，促进定制适合。

sentences.english: The ring was full of communication, but no discordant noise.
sentences.chinese: 这个环带充满交流，但没有不协调的杂音。

sentences.english: Soft leather and synthetic upper with hook-and-loop strap for a secure fit.
sentences.chinese: 柔软的皮革和一个安全的适合的钩环带的合成上。

definition: Tai Wan, a locality in Kowloon, Hong Kong
